relatedRecords.name: Bonny Island IWD2020
relatedRecords.description: International Women’s Day (IWD) is marked on March 8th every year. In different regions, the focus of celebrations ranges from general respect and appreciation toward women to a celebration of women’s economic, political, and social achievements. This is going to be the first of its kind in Bonny I…
